head.supplied: 16/4/85. ¶ ¶ I might just mention, dear Mr Sewell, that my correspondent in Prague is Professor Dr Willkomm; but I would recommend, that the books rather be sent direct to the Librarian of the Univer...

div.p: P85/1182 unit 53, VPRS 1163/P1 inward correspondence files, VA 672 Premier's Office, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I might just mention, dear Mr Sewell, that my correspondent in Prague is Professor Dr Willkomm; but I would recommend, that the books rather be sent direct to the Librarian of the University,
See M to J. Traill, 3 April 1885. as Dr Willkomm is not aware of the wishes of the other bohemian Gentleman.

div.p:
Ferd. von Mueller.
See also M to W. Sewell, 17 April 1885.
